mapper.select: SELECT ui.* FROM (SELECT b.book_id,b.book_name,bi.author,bi.borrow_date,bi.return_date,bi.book_pub,bi.pub_date,bi.category,bi.imgurl FROM book b LEFT JOIN book_info bi ON b.book_id=bi.book_info_id) ui RIGHT JOIN (SELECT ubb.book_id FROM user_book_borrower ubb WHERE ubb.borrower_id=#{loginUserId}) ubb ON ui.book_id=ubb.book_id
